aboutRight.aboutText: I'm a passionate software developer born in 1995, with a deep commitment to building innovative digital solutions. I started my journey in development back in 2017, and in 2022, I made the switch to focus on the JavaScript stack, which has allowed me to bring a fresh perspective to modern web development. I'm a determined individual aiming to make a meaningful impact through my work, constantly learning new technologies in the programming field. Writing code, fixing bugs, diving into documentation, and exploring creative solutions have become my daily routine over the last few years. I also have hands-on experience developing SaaS products and working under pressure to deliver high-quality results.

achivement.text: Hello there! My name is Lilon Macwan. I am a web designer & developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.
With 10+ years experience as a professional designer, I have acquired the skills to make your project a success.

aboutRight.note: Crafting visually appealing interfaces with a focus on seamless user experience is what I love to do

experienceData.text: As a developer, I had the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects, from simple landing pages to complex SaaS.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
contribution: Reviewed code, debugged problems and corrected issues
Had the opportunity to lead the frontend team for couple of months
Utilized Next.js to enhance server-side rendering and optimize performance

serviceData.title: Nomad Horizon
serviceData.heading: Online Service Reservation and Administration Portal
serviceData.text: Nomad Horizon is an Online Service Reservation and Administration Portal application. It is developed to attract Digital Nomads around the world and help them on course. It gives them options like book a service online, track their order and avail them on their journey.

serviceData.title: Red UI
serviceData.heading: Component builder library
serviceData.text: Red UI is a React.js component builder library built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It offers developers a wide range of components to use in their projects, providing flexibility and ease of use.

serviceData.title: Second Time Around
serviceData.heading: Mobile reselling platform
serviceData.text: Second Time Around is a mobile reselling website with a target to sell used mobile online. Through this platform People can list their product to sell and buy from other people. The platform is built with React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS and Firebase.
features: Product advertising system for logged in users

serviceData.title: Book Catalogue
serviceData.heading: Backend API for Book Catalogue
serviceData.text: Book Catalogue is a standalone backend project for a book catalogue application. It is built using Node.js, Express.js, Prisma and PostgreSQL. It provides various endpoints for creating, reading, updating and deleting operations.
